description: Transformer maintenance and testing for  specifications transformers located at 5 CDSB Gagetown and detachment Moncton. Period of contract from April 1 2023 to March 31, 2024 with option to renew for 2 one year periods. Estimated cost: $100,001 to $500,000 (HST included).
full_summary:
### ITT - Transformer Maintenance and Testing, Gagetown, NB
#### Request for Proposal
##### Tenders Number: WS3899900005
##### Solicitation Number: WS3899900005
##### Amendment Number: 1
##### Tender Closing Date: March 21, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals from qualified contractors for the provision of annual preventative maintenance and testing for transformers at 5 CDSB Gagetown and Detachment Moncton, pursuant to the plans and specifications for DND Project Number L-G2-9900/1900.

**Scope of Work**
The successful contractor will be required to:
* Provide all necessary labour, materials, tools, and equipment to conduct annual preventative maintenance testing for transformers
* Prepare and submit written reports of the testing as required
* Perform work in accordance with the plans and specifications for DND Project Number L-G2-9900/1900

**Contract Period**
The estimated contract period is from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024, with an option to renew for two additional one-year periods.

**Estimated Cost**
The estimated cost of the opportunity is between $100,001 and $500,000 (HST included).

**Eligibility**
The bid is open to all qualified contractors.

**Delivery Location**
Gagetown, New Brunswick

**Language of Bid**
English and French.

**Contact Information**
For any questions or concerns, please contact Timothee Beausoleil, at (613) XYZ-1234 or by email at.timothée.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Tender Documents**
The tender documents, including the entire RFP package, can be downloaded from http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15588253?extsite=MTU1ODgyNTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. GHz

Note: This rewritten entry has been formatted to comply with professional standards. The original document had been expanded by around 20% to ensure the necessary context and information were provided.
